task: Delete a row from a table
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document Document11.docx.
Navigate to the table from which you want to delete a row.
Place the cursor in any cell of the row you want to delete.
Right-click on the row to open the context menu.
Select the 'Delete Rows' option from the context menu.
Choose whether you want to delete the entire row or just the contents of the cells.
Click 'OK' to confirm the deletion of the row.
Verify that the row has been successfully deleted from the table.
